taskbody.context: You can print diagrams at any time. The diagram that you want to print must be opened and displayed in the Editor area. The diagram must also be active, which means that you are working on it in the Editor area. For example, if the diagram you want to print is opened and displayed in the Editor area but you clicked on the Outline view pane to work with the diagram, the Print function will not work.

step.cmd: On the DS Navigator view pane, double-click on the file that you want to print.

stepresult.p: The fileâ€™s diagram is displayed in the Editor area.

step.cmd: (Optional) If the diagram is large, you can set the page breaks from the menu bar by clicking Diagram View Page Breaks .
On the menu bar, click File Print . Alternatively, on the toolbar, you can click .
step.stepresult: The Print dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: If necessary, change the default print options (for example, diagram print range, number of copies to print).
